# common_packages
封装了一些通用的功能

打包
```bash
python -m build
```
安装
```bash
pip install common_packages-0.1.0.tar.gz
```
pypi
https://pypi.org/project/common-packages/#description

依赖
```bash
    "requests",
    'pika',
    "tencentcloud-sdk-python-tmt",
    "kafka-python",
    "clickhouse-driver",
    "numpy",
    "pandas",
    "sqlalchemy",
    "pymysql",
    "azure-cognitiveservices-speech",
```
### sms
腾讯云
```python

```
